repositories.title: Hello world agent
repositories.description: This sample uses an agent and LLM to generate greetings in different languages. It illustrates how the agent maintains contextual history in a session memory.

repositories.title: Multi-agent planning and execution
repositories.description: A sample application demonstrating how to build a multi-agent system using Akka and an LLM model.

repositories.title: Chat agent with RAG
repositories.description: This sample illustrates how to build an AI agent that performs a RAG workflow.

repositories.title: Travel planning agent
repositories.description: The Travel Planner Agent is an AI-powered application built on the Akka SDK that helps users create personalized travel itineraries.

repositories.title: Medical discharge summary tagging
repositories.description: This experiment investigates whether an AI Agentic System can automatically tag medical discharge summaries based on the necessity of hospitalization.

repositories.title: IoT sensor monitoring
repositories.description: This sample is a temperature monitoring system that collects, aggregates, and analyzes temperature data from IoT sensors. The system uses AI to generate insights about temperature trends and anomalies across different locations. Collects and aggregates temperature data using Key Value Entities. OpenAI is used for anomaly and trend detection.
repositories.concepts: Agent, IoT, Trend analysis, Anomaly detection, Entity, OpenAI

repositories.title: Release note summarizer
repositories.description: This sample is designed to run every time there is a release from configured GitHub repositories. It interacts with Anthropic Claude from an agent and uses tools to retrieve detailed information from GitHub. Entities are used for storing release summaries. A timed action looks for new releases periodically and creates the summary using the LLM.
repositories.concepts: Agent, Entity, Timed Action, Anthropic Claude, Tools, Summarization

repositories.title: Customer service chat workflow
repositories.description: The real-estate customer service agent demonstrates how to combine Akka features with an LLM model. It illustrates an agentic workflow for customer service. It processes incoming real-estate inquiries, analyzes the content to extract details, provides follow-up when needed and saves the collected information for future reference.
repositories.concepts: Agent, Workflow, Analysis, Detail extraction, Human in the loop, Agent Memory

repositories.title: Trip booking with tools
repositories.description: This app represents a travel agency that searches for flights and accommodations. Itâ€™s composed by an LLM (Anthropic) using Spring AI and AI tools to find flights, accommodations and sending mails.
repositories.concepts: Agent, Tools, Anthropic, Spring AI, Workflow

repositories.title: Multi-source health sensor analysis
repositories.description: This sample illustrates an AI agent that uses an LLM to analyze data from fitness trackers, medical records and other sensors. It integrates with Fitbit and MongoDB Atlas.

repositories.title: Akka Chess
repositories.description: Embedded UI, Entity, Workflow, View, Timed Action
repositories.concepts: Entity, Events, HTTP Endpoint, Akka Persistence

repositories.title: Shopping cart
repositories.description: This sample shows a very simple microservice implementing a shopping cart with an event-sourced entity.

repositories.title: Customer data store
repositories.description: This sample illustrates the use of entities and query capabilities with a view. This example shows a simple set of traditional queries and data mutations through events.

repositories.title: Wallet transfer
repositories.description: This example illustrates a funds transfer workflow between two wallets.

repositories.title: Wallet transfer with failure compensation
repositories.description: This example illustrates a funds transfer workflow between two wallets managed by external service.

repositories.title: Choreographed user signup flow
repositories.description: This example is a user registration service implemented as a choreography saga.

repositories.title: Event Sourced Counter with Broker Integration
repositories.description: This project demonstrates the use of an Event Sourced Entity and the different ways to consume and produce from/to a broker.

repositories.title: JWT HTTP Endpoint
repositories.description: This project demonstrates the use of JWT in a HTTP Endpoint.
